trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles" /> namespace contains classes for rendering controls and other Windows user interface (UI) elements with visual styles in operating systems that support them.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles" /> 命名空间中包含一些类，这些类使用支持它们的操作系统中的视觉样式呈现控件和其他 Windows 用户界面 (UI) 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles> namespace contains the following main classes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles>命名空间包含以下主要的类：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> is a foundation class for identifying any control or UI element supported by visual styles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> 是用于标识任何控件或 UI 元素支持的视觉样式的基础类。

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> itself, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles> namespace includes many nested classes of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> with `static` properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for every state of a control, control part, or other UI element supported by visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 除了 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> 本身，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles> 命名空间包含许多 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> 嵌套类，这些类具有为视觉样式支持的控件、控件部件或其他 UI 元素的状态返回 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> 的 `static` 属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton.Pressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that identifies a button in the pressed state with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton.Pressed%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>，它标识以视觉样式处于按下状态的按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> provides methods that draw and get information about each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> defined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> 提供绘制并获取有关每项信息的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>由操作系统的当前视觉样式定义。

trans-unit.source: Information that can be retrieved about an element includes its default size, background type, and color definitions.
trans-unit.target: 可以检索的元素信息包括其默认大小、背景类型和颜色定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> provides a set of `static` properties that provide information about the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> 提供了一套`static`提供有关当前的视觉样式的操作系统的信息的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles> namespace also includes a set of enumerations.

Some of these enumerations, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState>, provide state definitions for related visual style elements.
trans-unit.target: 某些这些枚举，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState>，提供相关的视觉样式元素的状态定义。

trans-unit.source: Most of the other enumerations support <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> methods that return information about a particular element.
trans-unit.target: 大部分其他枚举支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>方法用以返回关于某个特定元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty> enumeration provides the possible argument values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty>枚举提供了有关可能的参数值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState> enumeration provides values that define how visual styles are currently applied to the application.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState>枚举提供了定义可视样式如何的值当前应用于应用程序。
